mapper.insert:
insert into PRM_PLAN ( PK_DEPT,PK_DEPT_NAME,CODE,NAME,PK_PLAN_VERSION,PK_PROCESS,PK_PROCESS_NAME,ENABLESTATE,DEFPLAN,INVALIDATE,ID,TENANTID,SYSID,ORGID,ORGID_NAME,TS,DR,CREATOR,CREATIONTIME,MODIFIER,MODIFIEDTIME,CREATOR_NAME,MODIFIER_NAME,PK_POST,PK_POST_NAME,CYCLE,ROUTEFLAG,IVERSION,VNOTE )
select #{item.pk_dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pk_dept_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pk_plan_version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pk_process,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pk_process_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.enablestate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{defplan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invalidate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tenantid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orgid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.dr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.creator_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifier_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pk_post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pk_post_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cycle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.routeflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.iversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual

mapper.update:
update PRM_PLAN
PK_DEPT = #{pk_dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_DEPT_NAME = #{pk_dept_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_PLAN_VERSION = #{pk_plan_version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_PROCESS = #{pk_process,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_PROCESS_NAME = #{pk_process_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLESTATE = #{enablestate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEFPLAN = #{defplan,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANTID = #{tenantid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSID = #{sysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID_NAME = #{orgid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TS = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DR = #{dr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATIONTIME = #{creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIEDTIME = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_NAME = #{creator_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_NAME = #{modifier_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_POST = #{pk_post,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_POST_NAME = #{pk_post_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CYCLE = #{cycle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ROUTEFLAG = #{routeflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IVERSION = #{iversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VNOTE = #{vnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id}

update PRM_PLAN set PK_DEPT = #{pk_dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_DEPT_NAME = #{pk_dept_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_PLAN_VERSION = #{pk_plan_version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_PROCESS = #{pk_process,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_PROCESS_NAME = #{pk_process_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLESTATE = #{enablestate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEFPLAN = #{defplan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DR = #{dr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TENANTID = #{tenantid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSID = #{sysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGID_NAME = #{orgid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TS = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIEDTIME = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER_NAME = #{modifier_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_POST = #{pk_post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_POST_NAME = #{pk_post_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CYCLE = #{cycle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ROUTEFLAG = #{routeflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IVERSION = #{iversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VNOTE = #{vnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
from PRM_PLAN where
pk_plan_version = #{search.searchMap.pk_plan_version} and DR = 1 order by iversion desc
DR = 0 and DEFPLAN = 1
and enablestate in (1)
and enablestate in (0,1)
and enablestate in (1)
and code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{search.searchMap.code}), '%')
and name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{search.searchMap.name}), '%')
and creator_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{search.searchMap.creator_name}), '%')
